meanings.definition: Extremely small in size, amount, or degree.
meanings.sent1: The ant carried the minutest crumb back to its nest.
meanings.sent2: She paid attention to even the minutest details in her artwork.
meanings.sent3: The minutest bug became the hero of the tiny forest.
meanings.sent4: His voice was so soft, it was like the minutest whisper in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The minutest star in the sky twinkled faintly.

meanings.definition: The smallest or least significant details.
meanings.sent1: He analyzed the minutest of clues to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent2: The report covered even the minutest of the meeting discussions.
meanings.sent3: The detective found the minutest clue hidden in plain sight.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, it was the minutest of issues.
meanings.sent5: Her memory captured even the minutest of moments.
